
# Linkpay 
![linkpay](https://static.openfintech.io/vendors/linkpay/logo.png?w=400&c=v0.59.26#w200)  

## General 
 
**Code:** `linkpay` 
 
**Name:** 
 
:	[EN] Linkpay 
 
**Status:** `active` 
 
**Description:** 
 
: [EN]  Linkpay is the payment industry's first 100% cloud-built payment solutions platform. Our next generation payment solutions helps online and mobile businesses accept credit card payments by providing a complete payment solution from the cloud. We handle everything, including your merchant account, gateway, storing cards, subscriptions, PCI Security and direct payout to your bank account. You have complete payment service through a single secure partner.  We offer solutions differently than other in the industry. We’re Secure, Flexible, Driven all within the Cloud. We’re a breath of fresh new and exciting air. Our passion for technology and payment solutions is unrivaled and it shows in our services.  
 
 
**Countries:** 
 
:	![BM](https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/flag-icon-css/3.3.0/flags/4x3/bm.svg#w24) 	![CA](https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/flag-icon-css/3.3.0/flags/4x3/ca.svg#w24) 	![GR](https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/flag-icon-css/3.3.0/flags/4x3/gr.svg#w24) 	![MX](https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/flag-icon-css/3.3.0/flags/4x3/mx.svg#w24) 	![PM](https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/flag-icon-css/3.3.0/flags/4x3/pm.svg#w24) 	![UM](https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/flag-icon-css/3.3.0/flags/4x3/um.svg#w24)  
**Address:** 
street:  3129 Tiger Run Court3129 California
